job.title: Senior Data Engineer, Consumer Growth
job.description: ltstronggtltugtAbout The TeamltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtOur data engineering team is responsible for building the data processing and reporting infrastructure that powers companywide insights and operational intelligence By designing and implementing scalable data pipelines data warehouses and reporting platforms the data engineering team serves as the foundation for decisionmaking at DoorDashltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtAbout The RoleltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtDoorDash is looking for a Senior Data Engineer with a passion for solving complex problems and a background in marketing or consumerdriven applications of data or other relevant experience The ideal candidate demonstrates proficiency in manipulating large datasets to act as a technical powerhouse when scaling databases dashboards tools reports and modelsltbrgtltbrgtThis role will work closely with Marketing and Consumer Growth teams to develop a detailed understanding of how our customers engage with our products and services as well as other marketing and promotional channels We are looking for a candidate who will be responsible for creating the data foundations that underpin internal tools such as CRM experimentation audiences and other intelligence platformsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtYoure Excited About This Opportunity Because You WillltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtWork alongside worldclass data science and machine learning teamsltligtltligtTake ownership endtoend from defining the data architecture to implementing data models pipelines monitoring and quality assurance frameworksltligtltligtUnify data from multiple data sources using SQL Python and other languages to unlock business insightsltligtltligtManage a portfolio of pipelines and data marts that empower analysts and data scientists across the companyltligtltligtDocument new and existing models solutions and implementationsltligtltligtEnsure that processed data meets our high quality standardsltligtltligtContinuously improve and optimize our jobs to hit performance targetsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtWere Excited About You Because You HaveltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtHave prior experience working with marketing andor consumerdriven applications of data such as web ampamp mobile event processing consumer profiling attribution modeling or marketing automationltligtltligt5 years experience working in data engineering business intelligence or a similar roleltligtltligtExpert in SQL and optimizing complex queriesltligtltligtProficient in programming in PythonltligtltligtExperience working with Snowflake Redshift PostgreSQL andor other DBMS platformsltligtltligtExperience with data generated by proprietary software systems and industry SaaS solutions SFDC and Segment a plusltligtltligtExposure to andor development experience with open source frameworks such as Apache PySpark Druid message queue and streaming technologiesltligtltligtExcellent communication skills and experience working with business and data science teams to assess their data needsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtWhy Youll Love Working at DoorDashltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtWe are leaders  Leadership is not limited to our management team Its something everyone at DoorDash embraces and embodiesltligtltligtWe are doers  We believe the only way to predict the future is to build it Creating solutions to lead our company and our industry is what we do  on every project every dayltligtltligtWe are learners  Were not afraid to dig in and uncover the truth even if its scary or inconvenient Everyone here is continually learning on the job no matter if weve been in a role for one year or one minuteltligtltligtWe are customerobsessed  Our mission is to grow and empower local economies We are committed to our customers merchants and dashers and believe in connecting people with possibilityltligtltligtWe are all DoorDash  The magic of DoorDash is our people together making our inspiring goals attainable and driving us to greater heightsltligtltligtWe offer great compensation packages and comprehensive health benefitsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtAbout DoorDashltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtDoorDash is a technology company that connects customers with their favorite local and national businesses in over 4000 cities and all 50 states across the United States and Canada Founded in 2013 DoorDash empowers merchants to grow their businesses by offering ondemand delivery datadriven insights and better instore efficiency providing delightful experiences from door to door By building the lastmile delivery infrastructure for local cities DoorDash is bringing communities closer one doorstep at a time Read more on the ltstronggtDoorDash engineering blogltstronggt or at wwwdoordashcom
